_description: On ingratitude — two couplets translating ‘Lex et natura Christus simul omnia iura / Dampnant ingratum plangung illum fore natum’ which precedes it in John Grimestone’s preaching notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Ihesu crist & almankendeDampnen þe man þat is
                    vnkende& skil þat hat ben her afornHat weiled þat euere
                    was he born
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 19.
